name: prot-table
description: A customizable table component in vue. Intended to be used as a web-component.

scripts.build: vue-cli-service build --mode production --dest dist/web-component --target wc --name prot-table && cp public/web-component.html dist/index.html && cp public/data.json dist/data.json
scripts.buildlib: vue-cli-service build --mode production --dest dist/vue-component --target lib --name prot-table ./src/index.js
scripts.buildwc: vue-cli-service build --mode production --dest dist/web-component --target wc --name prot-table ./src/index.js
scripts.watchwc: vue-cli-service build --mode production --dest dist/web-component --target wc --name prot-table ./src/index.js --watch
scripts.patch: git add * && git commit && git push && npm version patch && npm run buildwc && npm publish
